prompt: Close-up, photorealistic macro shot of a strand of pearls being held delicately between two fingers, focused on the pearl's surface texture. One pearl is slightly out of focus in the foreground, creating depth of field. The background is a soft, diffused light reflecting off iridescent nacre. Emphasize the subtle imperfections and variations in color, illustrating the natural origin. Lighting: Soft, diffused studio lighting with subtle highlights to accentuate the texture. Style: Photorealistic, macro photography. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-real-pearls-image-1.png

prompt: A woman's hand holding a single pearl necklace against a brightly lit window, sunlight streaming through it. The focus is on the internal light refraction within the pearls, creating a soft glow. The background shows a blurred view of a tranquil ocean scene. The woman's skin is smooth and subtly illuminated. Style: Naturalistic, bright, and airy. Lighting: Natural sunlight filtering through the window, creating highlights and shadows. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-real-pearls-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic still life of various tools used for pearl identification: a jeweler's loupe, a pearl grading tray with pearls of different sizes and colors, a caliper, and a certificate of authenticity. The items are arranged on a dark wooden surface, with a single spotlight highlighting the details. Style: Classic still life, high detail. Lighting: Dramatic single-source spotlight, creating strong shadows and highlights. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-real-pearls-image-3.png

prompt: A split-screen image. On the left, a high-resolution close-up of a real pearl being gently rubbed against a human tooth, showing the slight grainy texture. On the right, a fake pearl being rubbed against a tooth, showing a smooth, glossy surface. The background is a neutral grey, emphasizing the texture difference. Style: Scientific, comparative, highly detailed. Lighting: Even, diffused lighting to highlight the texture differences. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-real-pearls-image-4.png

prompt: A wide shot showcasing a pearl farm in a serene, tropical lagoon. Focus on the oyster cages suspended in the clear turquoise water, with workers in the distance tending to the oysters. The background features lush green islands and a clear blue sky with soft clouds. Style: Documentary, landscape photography. Lighting: Natural sunlight, with a slightly warm tone to convey the tropical atmosphere. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-real-pearls-image-5.png
